sentences.en: A deceitful peace is more hurtful than an open war.
sentences.cn: 虚假的和平比公开的战争危害更大.

sentences.en: A true witness delivereth a deceitful witness speaketh lies.
sentences.cn: 25作真见证的,救人性命;吐出谎言的,施行诡诈.

sentences.en: An unprincipled, deceitful, and unreliable person a scoundrel or rascal.
sentences.cn: 无赖, 流氓,恶棍:不讲道德 、 欺诈和不可靠的人;赖皮或流氓.

sentences.en: Analogy may be a deceitful guide.
sentences.cn: 类推方法有时不免导入错误的途径.

sentences.en: Deliver my soul, O Lord, from lying lips, and a deceitful tongue.
sentences.cn: 2耶和华啊, 求你救我脱离说谎的嘴唇和诡诈的舌头!

sentences.en: Do not desire his delicacies, For they are deceitful food.
sentences.cn: 3不可贪恋他的美食, 因为那是骗人的食物.

sentences.en: Don't knowing can there is real tears, also becoming deceitful thing perhaps.
sentences.cn: 不知可否有真正的眼泪, 也许也变成了虚假的事物.

sentences.en: From his appearance, he does seem a deceitful man.
sentences.cn: 从貌相上看, 他并不像个奸诈之人.

sentences.en: His manner was sly and deceitful.
sentences.cn: 他的态度诡诈而又不老实。

sentences.en: I advise you not to cooperate with that deceitful businessman.
sentences.cn: 我建议你不要和那个不诚实的商人合作.

sentences.en: NIV Save me, O Lord, from lying lips and from deceitful tongues.
sentences.cn: [和合]耶和华啊!求你救我脱离说谎的嘴唇和2诡诈的舌头.

sentences.en: Nothing is more deceitful than the appearance of humility.
sentences.cn: 谦恭的外表最易使人上当.

sentences.en: She can not accuse me of showing one bit of deceitful softness.
sentences.cn: 她不能控诉我说我表示过一点虚伪的温柔.

sentences.en: So say, the sincerity excels deceitful, the deceitful mightier than is unreal.
sentences.cn: 所以说, 真诚胜过虚假, 虚假胜过虚无.

sentences.en: That deceitful manager uses his assistant as a tool.
sentences.cn: 诡计多端的经理把他的助手当做工具.

sentences.en: What he said is deceitful words.

words.tran_cn: 欺骗的；欺诈的；谎言的；虚伪的

trans.tran_en: someone who is deceitful tells lies in order to get what they want
